caption: File System Activity
description: File System Activity events report when a process performs an action on a file or folder.
name: file_activity

activity.description: The normalized caption of 'activity_id' or the source specific value.

1.caption: Create
1.description: A request to create a new file on a file system.

2.caption: Read
2.description: A request to read data from a file on a file system.

3.caption: Update
3.description: A request to write data to a file on a file system.

4.caption: Delete
4.description: A request to delete a file on a file system.

5.caption: Rename
5.description: A request to rename a file on a file system.

6.caption: Set Attributes
6.description: A request to set attributes for a file on a file system.

7.caption: Set Security
7.description: A request to set security for a file on a file system.

8.caption: Get Attributes
8.description: A request to get attributes for a file on a file system.

9.caption: Get Security
9.description: A request to get security for a file on a file system.

10.caption: Encrypt
10.description: A request to encrypt a file on a file system.

11.caption: Decrypt
11.description: A request to decrypt a file on a file system.

12.caption: Mount
12.description: A request to mount a file on a file system.

13.caption: Unmount
13.description: A request to unmount a file from a file system.

14.caption: Open
14.description: A request to create a file handle.

category_uid.description: The category unique identifier of the event.

class_uid.description: The unique identifier of a class. A class describes the attributes available in an event.

1001.caption: File System Activity
1001.description: File System Activity events report when a process performs an action on a file or folder.

component.description:
The name or relative pathname of a sub-component of the data object, if applicable.

For example: attachment.doc, attachment.zip/bad.doc, or part.mime/part.cab/part.uue/part.doc.

device.description: The device that is the target of the activity.

file.description: The file that is the target of the activity.

type_uid.description: The resulting file object when the activity was allowed and successful.

100100.caption: Unknown
100100.description: The activity type "File System Activity: Unknown" is not further specified.

100101.caption: Create
100101.description: A request to create a new file on a file system.

100102.caption: Read
100102.description: A request to read data from a file on a file system.

100103.caption: Update
100103.description: A request to write data to a file on a file system.

100104.caption: Delete
100104.description: A request to delete a file on a file system.

100105.caption: Rename
100105.description: A request to rename a file on a file system.

100106.caption: Set Attributes
100106.description: A request to set attributes for a file on a file system.

100107.caption: Set Security
100107.description: A request to set security for a file on a file system.

100108.caption: Get Attributes
100108.description: A request to get attributes for a file on a file system.

100109.caption: Get Security
100109.description: A request to get security for a file on a file system.

100110.caption: Encrypt
100110.description: A request to encrypt a file on a file system.

100111.caption: Decrypt
100111.description: A request to decrypt a file on a file system.

100112.caption: Mount
100112.description: A request to mount a file on a file system.

100113.caption: Unmount
100113.description: A request to unmount a file from a file system.

100114.caption: Open
100114.description: A request to create a file handle.

100199.caption: Other
100199.description: The activity type "File System Activity: Other" is not further specified.
